title: Changing the growth paradigm
selftext: India’s policymakers must free themselves from western-dominated theories of economics and in this, local solutions are the way to solve global systemic problems
comments:
GDP and GDP per capita are not key metrics.

If 10 people make 10 billion dollars a year in a country of 1000 people. Then:-

GDP is 100 billion dollars.

GDP per capita is 100 million dollars.

Now we are assuming the remaining 990 make 100 million a year. Which need not be true.
